clinical_study.brief_title: EUREKA Italy - Evaluation of Real-life Use of KLOX BioPhotonic System in Chronic Wounds Management
clinical_study.official_title: EUREKA Italy - The Evaluation of Real-life Use of KLOX BioPhotonic System in Chronic Wounds Management: a Reproducibility Study

brief_summary.textblock: Multi-center, prospective, interventional, uncontrolled open-label study evaluating the real-life use of KLOX LumiHeal BioPhotonic System in chronic wounds management (venous leg ulcers, diabetic foot ulcers, pressure ulcers).

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events, Serious Adverse Events and Device Incidents
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients with adverse events, serious adverse events and device incidents.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of wound breakdown, following wound closure
Ease of use by healthcare professionals (questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.description: To collect feedback on the ease of use of the KLOX LumiHeal BioPhotonic System in the management of chronic wounds, from health care professional users.

secondary_outcome.measure: Impact of treatment on Health-related Quality of Life (CWIS questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.description: To collect quality of life data in patients treated with the KLOX LumiHeal BioPhotonic System.

arm_group.description: Treatment of chronic wounds with KLOX LumiHeal BioPhotonic System

intervention.description: Real-life use of KLOX LumiHeal BioPhotonic System in combination with standard of care.
